text.section:
Except as provided under subsection (b) of this section, the County Executive may:
negotiate agreements with a developer for real property located in the county;
include a federal, State, or local government or unit as an additional party to the agreement; and
execute an agreement.

The County Executive may not enter into an agreement unless:
the agreement is approved by the district council; and
the county planning board determines that the proposed agreement is consistent with the Commission's general plan.
